title: Jump In The Line
lyrics:
[intro] (D)  (A)  x8
 
[chorus]
(D)Shake, shake, shake, Senora, shake your body (A)line
Shake, shake, shake, Senora, (A7) shake it all the (D)time
Work, work, work, Senora, work your body (A)line
Work, work, work, Senora, (A7) work it all the (D)time
 
(D)My girl's name is (G)Senora, I (D)tell you friends, I (A)adore her
And (D)when she dances, oh (G)brother! She's a (D)hurricane in (A)all kinds of weather
 
(D)Jump in de line, (A) rock your body in (D)time - OK, (A) I believe you!  x3
(D)Jump in de line, (A) rock your body in (D)time - Whoa! (A)
 
[chorus]
(D)Shake, shake, shake, Senora, shake your body (A)line
Shake, shake, shake, Senora, (A7) shake it all the (D)time
Work, work, work, Senora, work your body (A)line
Work, work, work, Senora, (A7) work it all the (D)time
 
(D)You can talk about (G)Cha Cha (D)Tango, Waltz, or de (A)Rumba
(D)Senora's dance has no (G)title, you (D)jump in the saddle, hold (A)on to de bridle!
 
(D)Jump in de line, (A) rock your body in (D)time - OK, (A) I believe you!
(D)Jump in de line, (A) rock your body in (D)time - Rock your body, (A)child!
(D)Jump in de line, (A) rock your body in (D)time - Somebody, (A)help me!
(D)Jump in de line, (A) rock your body in (D)time - Whoa! (A)
 
[chorus]
(D)Shake, shake, shake, Senora, shake your body (A)line
Shake, shake, shake, Senora, (A7) shake it all the (D)time
Work, work, work, Senora, work your body (A)line
Work, work, work, Senora, (A7) work it all the (D)time
 
(D)Senora, she's a (G)sensation, the (D)reason for (A)aviation
And (D)fellas, you got to (G)watch it, when she (D)wind up, she bottom, she (A)go like a rocket!
 
(D)Jump in de line, (A) rock your body in (D)time - OK, (A) I believe you!
(D)Jump in de line, (A) rock your body in (D)time - Hoist those (A) skirts a leetle higher!
(D)Jump in de line, (A) rock your body in (D)time - Up the (A) chim-en-y!
(D)Jump in de line, (A) rock your body in (D)time - Whoa oh (A) oh oh!
 
[chorus]
(D)Shake, shake, shake, Senora, shake your body (A)line
Shake, shake, shake, Senora, (A7) shake it all the (D)time
Work, work, work, Senora, work your body (A)line
Work, work, work, Senora, (A7) work it all the (D)time
 
(D)Senora dances (G)Calypso (D)left to right is de (A)tempo
And (D)when she gets the (G)sensation, she go (D)up in the air, come (A)down in slow motion
 
(D)Jump in de line, (A) rock your body in (D)time - OK, (A) I believe you!
(D)Jump in de line, (A) rock your body in (D)time - Somebody, (A)help me!
(D)Jump in de line, (A) rock your body in (D)time - OK, (A) I believe you!
(D)Jump in de line, (A) rock your body in (D)time - Whoa! (A)
 
(D)Shake, shake, shake, Senora, shake your body (A)line
Shake, shake, shake, Senora, (A7) shake it all the (D)time
Work, work, work, Se(D)no(D)ra!! [end]
